Episodes.Title: Voicemail
Episodes.Plot: In the opener to the second season, troubled Tommy Gavin is having a difficult time adjusting to life at his new uneventful firehouse after the volatile split with his old crew.  On top of this he is still looking for his missing wife who has kidnapped his three children and he has to come to terms with the fact that his dead cousin?s wife is pregnant with his baby.  His frustrations come to a head and he has a meltdown with a street vendor selling 9/11 memorabilia.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes
Episodes.GuestStars: Connor  Martin,  Jack  Leary,  Adam  Mastrelli,  Tony Cucci,  James Biberi,  Robert Turano,  David Vadim,  Terry Serpico,  Lee Tergesen,  Samuel Ray Gates,  Ron Domingo,  Albert Jones,  Rick Zahn,  Rob Munk,  Kris

Episodes.Title: Harmony
Episodes.Plot: In an effort to get more time off to search for his wife and kids, Tommy joins the new firehouse?s Barbershop Quartet.  Meanwhile back at the old station, Lou and Chief Reilly conspire to get Tommy back, but the rest of the crew has grown fond of his replacement.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: Reunion

Episodes.Title: Shame

Episodes.Title: Believe
Episodes.Plot: Jerry forces the crew to attend a birthday party that his son is throwing for his boyfriend. Meanwhile, Tommy makes a move on Mariel after she tells him she might not be his half sister after all. Franco asks Laura to move in with him while Sheila tries to make Tommy jealous by showing off her new girlfriend.

Episodes.Title: Rebirth
Episodes.Plot: Tommy starts taking Janet's antidepressants. When Sean meddles in Franco and Laura's troubled relationship he makes things worse.  After a gay visitor, the crew wonders about Mike's sexuality.

Episodes.Title: Bitch
Episodes.Plot: Tommy lays off the antidepressants when he is kicked off the hockey team. Sheila asks Tommy to talk Damien out of being a firefighter. Episodes.Title: Happy
Episodes.Plot: Tommy's sister suddenly shows up in town when their dad is about to inherit a million dollars. Tommy and Janet decide to renew their wedding vows. Meanwhile, Mike is worried when he finds a lump.

Episodes.Title: Justice
Episodes.Plot: Tommy copes with a tragedy. Jerry must decide what to do when his wife's condition worsens. Sean has a crisis of faith. Lou learns some shocking facts about Candy. And the crew responds to a multi-level building fire with people trapped inside.
